appDefinition.Label: LMS Admin
appDefinition.Metadata: <CustomApplication xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <defaultLandingTab>standard-home</defaultLandingTab> <description>Provides central location to manage the entry of Course information for Delivery and Sales</description> <isNavAutoTempTabsDisabled>false</isNavAutoTempTabsDisabled> <isNavPersonalizationDisabled>false</isNavPersonalizationDisabled> <isServiceCloudConsole>false</isServiceCloudConsole> <label>LMS Admin</label> <tabs>ccrz__E_Product__c</tabs> <tabs>redwing__Training_Plan__c</tabs> <tabs>redwing__Learning__c</tabs> <tabs>redwing__Achievement__c</tabs> <tabs>Course_Catalog__c</tabs> <tabs>Course_Catalog_Tag__c</tabs> <tabs>redwing__Training_Track__c</tabs> <tabs>ccrz__E_PriceList__c</tabs> <tabs>ccrz__E_Category__c</tabs> <tabs>ccrz__E_Spec__c</tabs> <tabs>redwing__Achievement_Assignment__c</tabs> <tabs>redwing__Training_Plan_Achievement__c</tabs> </CustomApplication>
